import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Style from './Header.module.scss' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const Header = () => { const [term, setTerm] = useState('') const history = useHistory() const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() history.push(`/search?query=${term}`) } return (
Youtube
setTerm(e.target.value)} value={term}/>
) } export default Header
